name: City and Roll
description:
This is  a 4 player hot seat style game so only one device is needed to play.

Controls

The controls are very simple, press enter to begin your turn and space to roll a number. The first person to get to the end wins.

To pause the game press the escape key and to resume click on the resume button.

To quit the game go back to the main menu via the pause menu or if a winner has been determined press enter. Once back at the main menu just click the quit button to close the game.

Hope you enjoy!
